actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title and interest of the United States in and to a tract of land located in Scotts Bluff County, Nebr., to Robert L. Summerville of Scotts Bluff County, Nebr.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title and interest of the United States in and to a tract of land located in Scotts Bluff County, Nebraska, to Robert L. Summerville of Scotts Bluff County, Nebraska.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title and interest of the United States in and to a tract of land located in Scotts Bluff County, Nebr., to Robert L. Summerville of Scotts Bluff County, Nebr.
